### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE Drug (
  drug_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  drug_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  drug_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Gene (
  gene_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  gene_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  gene_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE DrugGeneInteraction (
  interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  drug_id INT,
  gene_id INT,
  interaction_type VARCHAR(50),
  FOREIGN KEY (drug_id) REFERENCES Drug(drug_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (gene_id) REFERENCES Gene(gene_id)
)

CREATE TABLE Patient (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  patient_age INT,
  patient_gender VARCHAR(10)
)

CREATE TABLE DrugPrescription (
  prescription_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  drug_id INT,
  prescription_date DATE,
  dosage VARCHAR(50),
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Patient(patient_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (drug_id) REFERENCES Drug(drug_id)
)

### STATEMENT

DELETE FROM Drug WHERE drug_id = 1;

  drug_id INT PRIMARY KEY,

  drug_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Gene (
  gene_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  gene_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  gene_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE DrugGeneInteraction (
  interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  drug_id INT,
  gene_id INT,
  interaction_type VARCHAR(50),
  FOREIGN KEY (drug_id) REFERENCES Drug(drug_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (gene_id) REFERENCES Gene(gene_id)
)

CREATE TABLE Patient (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  patient_age INT,
  patient_gender VARCHAR(10)
)

CREATE TABLE DrugPrescription (
  prescription_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  drug_id INT,
  prescription_date DATE,
  dosage VARCHAR(50),
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Patient(patient_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (drug_id) REFERENCES Drug(drug_id)
)

### STATEMENT

DELETE Drug FROM Drug INNER JOIN DrugPrescription ON Drug.drug_id = DrugPrescription.drug_id WHERE DrugPrescription.patient_id = 1;

  prescription_id INT PRIMARY KEY,

### STATEMENT

DELETE Gene FROM Gene INNER JOIN DrugGeneInteraction ON Gene.gene_id = DrugGeneInteraction.gene_id WHERE DrugGeneInteraction.interaction_type = 'interaction_type_value';
